title: Pippin, Woolly-footed Rascal (4C314)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Companion • Hobbit
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Frodo
Game Text:	Skirmish: Add a burden to discard Pippin. Any Shadow player may remove (2) to prevent this.
Lore:	”'We had foul fare with the Orcs, and little enough for days before that. It seems a long while since we could eat to heart's content.'”
Rarity:	C
